title: Professional Services Discovery Call
description: A new customer has purchased professional services. An Implementation Consultant needs to conduct a discovery call to understand their goals and technical environment.

tasks.description: Schedule a discovery call with the customer's project stakeholders.
During the call, ask structured questions about the customer's goals, existing systems, and technical requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary information to begin planning the project.

tasks.description: Document the discovery findings and share them with the customer for validation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed discovery document that will form the basis of the project plan.
